articles.author: Jennifer Griffin
articles.title: Last surviving Doolittle Raider from attack on Japan remembered
articles.description: Lt. Col. Richard Cole, the last surviving Doolittle Raider, is to be remembered at a memorial in Texas.
articles.content:
It was a turning point in the war, just four months after Pearl Harbor, and gave the nation hope.
Lt. Col. Richard Cole, the last surviving Doolittle Raider, died last week at the age of 103. He was Jimmy Doolittle's co-pilot in the lead bomber that launched… [+2484 chars]
